Internal Composite Function for Interval Censoring (Internal)

Source: R/main.R
ICSurvICM.Rd

Provides an internal composite function that runs a full iterative procedure for fitting an interval-censored model, supporting different transformations. Typically called by the user-facing icsurvfit function.

Usage

ICSurvICM(delta, gamma, U, V, Z, model, maxiter = 500)

Arguments

delta, gamma, U, V

Numeric vectors representing censoring indicators and intervals.

Z

Matrix or data frame of covariates.

model

Character string, one of "NP", "PO", or "PH".

maxiter

Maximum number of iterations.

Value

A list with elements beta, y, t, var, and convergence info.

On this page
